name: James Strike Again
description:
This game is part of a 10 days gamejam (3 days for us, we came a bit late).

We just finished in time to make this prototype playable.

James Strike Again is a game where you juste have to cross the entire level. But the level seem almost impossible, so what can you do ? The answer is... Die.

By dying, you'll unlock upgrades for your player like the ability to move even if crouched or to make multiple jumps.
